# Repurpose.io CTA & Footer Section - Detailed Wireframe Specifications

## Overview
This document provides comprehensive wireframe specifications for the Repurpose.io Call-to-Action (CTA) section and Footer, featuring a prominent conversion-focused hero area with gradient background and a comprehensive footer with navigation links.

---

1. [CTA Section](#cta-section)
2. [Footer Section](#footer-section)
3. [Implementation Code](#implementation-code)
4. [Data Structures](#data-structures)
5. [Quick Reference](#quick-reference)

---

# CTA Section

## 1. CTA Section Structure & Layout

### Container Specifications
- **Max Width**: 1440px
- **Padding (horizontal)**: 80px (desktop), 40px (tablet), 20px (mobile)
- **Background**: Dark navy blue with gradient
- **Vertical Padding**: 140px top, 140px bottom
- **Position**: Between pricing section and footer

```

---

## 2. CTA Background

```css
background: linear-gradient(
  135deg,
  #1E3A5F 0%,
  #2A4A6F 50%,
  #1E3A5F 100%
)
/* Alternative solid color fallback */
background: #243B55
```

## 3. CTA Main Heading

### Content
"Ready to grow your online presence?"

### Layout Specifications
- **Width**: 100% (max 1000px centered)
- **Margin Bottom**: 32px
- **Text Alignment**: Center

"Take Repurpose for a test drive and publish 10 videos for FREE when you start your 14-day trial. No obligation. **No reason not to.**"

**Note**: "No reason not to." should be bold/emphasized

### Layout Specifications
- **Width**: 100% (max 900px centered)
- **Margin Bottom**: 48px
- **Text Alignment**: Center

```

display: inline-flex
align-items: center

margin: 0 auto
```

--- /** * Example Usage Page * * Simple example showing how to use each phone mockup variant * in a real Astro page. Copy and modify these examples for your needs. */ import Variant1 from '../components/repurpose/RepurposePhoneMockup.variant1.vue' import Variant2 from '../components/repurpose/RepurposePhoneMockup.variant2.vue' import Variant3 from '../components/repurpose/RepurposePhoneMockup.variant3.vue' --- Phone Mockup - Usage Examples

Phone Mockup Usage Examples

Copy these examples to use in your own pages

Example 1: Minimal Static Display

Perfect for landing pages with simple mockups. No video, no interactions.

Code:

<script setup>
import PhoneMockup from '@/components/repurpose/RepurposePhoneMockup.variant1.vue'
</script>

<template>
  <PhoneMockup
    platform="youtube"
    username="@creator"
    timestamp="2 days ago"
  />
</template>

Preview:

Example 2: Marketing Page with Hover Effects

Showcase real content with video previews and interactive hover effects.

Code:

<script setup>
import PhoneMockup from '@/components/repurpose/RepurposePhoneMockup.variant2.vue'
</script>

<template>
  <PhoneMockup
    platform="instagram"
    video-src="https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1523381210434-271e8be1f52b"
    username="@fashionbrand"
    timestamp="1 day ago"
    caption="New fall collection üçÇ"
    :likes="24500"
    :comments="312"
    :interactive="true"
  />
</template>

Preview: (Hover to see effect)

Example 3: Accessible Production Component

Enterprise-ready with full keyboard navigation and screen reader support. Try pressing Tab to navigate!

import PhoneMockup from '@/components/repurpose/RepurposePhoneMockup.variant3.vue'
</script>

    caption="Quick recipe: Homemade pasta üçù"
    :likes="89600"

    :interactive="true"

</template>

Accessibility Features: Use Tab to focus on elements, Enter or Space to activate buttons, and enable your screen reader to hear announcements when interacting.

  <PhoneMockup platform="facebook" :interactive="true" />
</div>

  • platform - Required

import "../styles/global.css"
import RepurposeHeader from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeHeader.vue"
import RepurposeHero from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeHero.vue"
import RepurposeSocialProofSection from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeSocialProof.vue"
import RepurposeFeaturesSection from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeFeatures.vue"
import RepurposeCreatorsChoiceSection from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeCreatorsChoice.vue"
import RepurposePricingSection from "../components/repurpose/RepurposePricing.vue"
import RepurposeCTA from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeCTA.vue"
import RepurposeFooter from "../components/repurpose/RepurposeFooter.vue"
---

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta name="generator" content={Astro.generator} />
    <meta name="description" content="Repurpose your content across multiple platforms. Save time and reach more audiences." />
    <title>Repurpose - Content Repurposing Made Easy</title>
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/favicon.svg" />
    <script is:inline>
      // Initialize theme from localStorage or system preference
      (function() {
        const stored = localStorage.getItem('theme');
        const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
        const theme = stored || (prefersDark ? 'dark' : 'light');
        document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', theme);
      })();
    </script>
  </head>
  <body class="antialiased bg-white dark:bg-gray-950 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100">
    <RepurposeHeader client:load />
    <main id="main-content">
      <RepurposeHero
        client:load
        videoSrc="https://i0.wp.com/repurpose.io/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Homepage-Header-Video-V3.mp4"
      />
      <!-- Social Proof Section: Stats, Testimonials, Integration Partners -->
      <RepurposeSocialProofSection client:visible />
      <!-- Features Section: 6 Key Platform Features -->
      <RepurposeFeaturesSection client:visible />
      <!-- Creators' Choice Section: Video Content Cards from Top Creators -->
      <RepurposeCreatorsChoiceSection client:visible />
      <!-- Pricing Section: 3 Pricing Tiers with Billing Toggle -->
      <RepurposePricingSection client:visible />
      <!-- CTA Section: Final Call-to-Action -->
      <RepurposeCTA client:visible />
    </main>
    <!-- Footer Section -->
    <RepurposeFooter client:visible />
  </body>
</html>

# üé® Best Workflow: Repurpose ‚Üí Socialaize Design Token Migration

## üìä Analysis Summary

### Current State:
**Repurpose Components Use:**
- ‚ùå Hardcoded hex colors (`#243B55`, `#FF4D8F`, `#6B7FFF`)
- ‚ùå Hardcoded rgba values (`rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)`)
- ‚ùå Custom gradients (pink, blue, cyan brand gradients)
- ‚ùå Platform-specific colors (YouTube red, Instagram gradient, etc.)

**Socialaize Design System Has:**
- ‚úÖ Comprehensive color palette (primary, success, warning, error, info)
- ‚úÖ Semantic tokens (surface, border, text)
- ‚úÖ Dark mode variants
- ‚úÖ Spacing system
- ‚úÖ Typography system
- ‚úÖ Tailwind utility classes

---

## üó∫Ô∏è Token Mapping Strategy

### Color Mapping:

| Repurpose Color | Hex Value | ‚Üí Socialaize Token | Notes |
|-----------------|-----------|-------------------|-------|
| **Navy Background** | `#243B55` | `--color-gray-900` | Dark navy ‚Üí Dark gray |
| **Pink Gradient** | `#FF4D8F ‚Üí #FF6BA5` | `--color-primary-500 ‚Üí --color-primary-400` | Brand pink ‚Üí Primary teal |
| **Blue Features** | `#6B7FFF` | `--color-info-500` | Feature blue ‚Üí Info blue |
| **Text Primary** | `#1A1A1A` | `--color-text-primary` | Dark text |
| **Text Secondary** | `#6B6B6B` | `--color-text-secondary` | Medium gray |
| **White/Transparent** | `rgba(255,255,255,0.75)` | `text-white/75` or `--color-text-inverse` | Use Tailwind opacity |
| **Borders** | `#E8E8E8`, `#D0D0D0` | `--color-border-primary`, `--color-border-secondary` | Border tokens |
| **Backgrounds** | `#FFFFFF`, `#FAFAFA` | `--color-surface-primary`, `--color-surface-secondary` | Surface tokens |

### Platform Colors (Keep As-Is):
- YouTube: `#FF0000` (brand identity)
- Instagram: Gradient (brand identity)
- TikTok: `#000000` (brand identity)  
- Facebook: `#1877F2` (brand identity)

---

## üõ†Ô∏è Recommended Workflow

### **Phase 1: Automated Batch Migration** (Recommended)

Use `/ui-refactor` command with `--batch` flag to systematically replace all hardcoded values:

```bash
/ui-refactor repurpose-socialaize/**/*.vue Replace all hardcoded Repurpose colors with Socialaize design tokens: 
- Replace #243B55 navy with bg-gray-900/text-gray-900
- Replace #FF4D8F pink with bg-primary-500/text-primary-500  
- Replace #6B7FFF blue with bg-info-500/text-info-500
- Replace rgba(255,255,255,0.75) with text-white/75
- Replace #1A1A1A with text-gray-900
- Replace #6B6B6B with text-gray-600
- Replace #FAFAFA with bg-gray-50
- Replace #FFFFFF with bg-white
- Keep platform brand colors (YouTube #FF0000, Instagram gradient, etc.)
--batch
```

**What This Does:**
1. **Discovers** all 21 Vue files in repurpose-socialaize/
2. **Analyzes** each file for hardcoded color values
3. **Replaces** systematically with Socialaize tokens
4. **Validates** TypeScript compilation after each change
5. **Reports** quality scores and issues

**Advantages:**
- ‚úÖ Consistent across all files
- ‚úÖ Automated validation
- ‚úÖ Rollback-friendly (git branch)
- ‚úÖ Quality scoring
- ‚úÖ Fast (4-6 min per component)

---

### **Phase 2: Manual Review & Refinement**

After batch migration, review these critical areas:

#### 1. **Gradient Replacements**
Repurpose uses custom pink/blue/cyan gradients. Replace with Socialaize gradients:

**Before:**
```vue
bg-gradient-to-br from-[#FF4D8F] to-[#FF6BA5]
```

**After:**
```vue
bg-gradient-to-br from-primary-500 to-primary-400
```

#### 2. **Dark Mode Compliance**
Add dark mode variants where missing:

**Before:**
```vue
<div class="bg-white text-gray-900">
```

**After:**
```vue
<div class="bg-white dark:bg-gray-900 text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100">
```

#### 3. **Component-Specific Adjustments**

**RepurposeFooter.vue:**
- Navy background `#243B55` ‚Üí `bg-gray-900 dark:bg-gray-950`
- White text opacities ‚Üí Tailwind opacity classes

**RepurposeCTA.vue:**
- Pink gradient button ‚Üí Primary gradient
- Navy background ‚Üí Gray background

**FeatureCard.vue:**
- Blue/Pink/Cyan gradients ‚Üí Primary/Info/Success gradients

---

### **Phase 3: Add Missing Socialaize Patterns**

Enhance components with Socialaize design system features:

#### 1. **Glass Effects**
```vue
<!-- Add to cards and surfaces -->
<div class="glass-subtle">
```

#### 2. **Focus Rings**
```vue
<!-- Replace custom focus states -->
<button class="focus-ring">
```

#### 3. **Animations**
```vue
<!-- Use design system transitions -->
<div class="transition-all duration-[var(--transition-normal)]">
```

---

## üìù Step-by-Step Execution Plan

### **Option A: Fully Automated (Fastest)**

```bash
# Step 1: Create git branch
git checkout -b migrate-repurpose-tokens

# Step 2: Run batch migration
/ui-refactor repurpose-socialaize/**/*.vue [migration instructions] --batch

# Step 3: Review changes
git diff

# Step 4: Test in browser
pnpm dev
# Visit: http://localhost:4321/repurpose-socialaize

# Step 5: Commit if satisfied
git add .
git commit -m "Migrate repurpose-socialaize to Socialaize design tokens"
```

**Time Estimate:** 60-90 minutes for all 21 components

---

### **Option B: Hybrid (Automated + Manual)**

```bash
# Step 1: Batch migrate colors only
/ui-refactor repurpose-socialaize/**/*.vue Replace hardcoded hex colors with Socialaize tokens --batch

# Step 2: Manually add dark mode variants
# Edit components one-by-one to add dark: classes

# Step 3: Manually refine gradients
# Replace custom gradients with Socialaize palette

# Step 4: Add Socialaize utilities
# Add glass-*, focus-ring, etc.
```

**Time Estimate:** 2-3 hours with more control

---

### **Option C: File-by-File (Most Control)**

Migrate components in priority order:

1. **RepurposeFooter.vue** (already touched, quick win)
2. **RepurposeHeader.vue** (navigation, high visibility)
3. **RepurposeHero.vue** (first impression)
4. **RepurposeCTA.vue** (conversion critical)
5. **Feature/Pricing/Social components** (content sections)
6. **Child components** (cards, toggles, icons)

```bash
# For each component:
/ui-refactor repurpose-socialaize/ComponentName.vue Migrate to Socialaize tokens
```

**Time Estimate:** 3-4 hours, highest quality

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Important Considerations

### **What to Keep:**
- ‚úÖ Platform brand colors (YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook)
- ‚úÖ Component structure and layouts
- ‚úÖ Interactive behaviors and animations
- ‚úÖ Accessibility features (ARIA, focus states)

### **What to Replace:**
- ‚ùå All Repurpose brand colors (`#243B55`, `#FF4D8F`)
- ‚ùå Hardcoded rgba/rgb values
- ‚ùå Custom CSS variables (`--color-repurpose-*`)
- ‚ùå Inline hex colors in class attributes

### **What to Add:**
- ‚ûï Dark mode support (`dark:` variants)
- ‚ûï Socialaize utilities (`glass-*`, `focus-ring`)
- ‚ûï Design system transitions
- ‚ûï Semantic color tokens

---

## üéØ My Recommendation

**Use Option A (Fully Automated)** because:

1. **Consistency**: All files migrated with same logic
2. **Speed**: Complete in ~90 minutes
3. **Quality**: Automated validation catches errors
4. **Reversible**: Easy to rollback via git
5. **Documented**: Batch refactor creates detailed report

Then follow up with **Phase 2 & 3** for refinements like dark mode and Socialaize-specific features.

---
